name: Bryx
appearance: Powerfully built with vine-and-flower tattoos inked in steel dye. Gentle hands despite size; wears a tool belt hung like a garden.
character: Soft-spoken and protective, happiest among humming constructs. Measures trust by whether someone oils their tools.
talents: soothes frightened animals and skittish constructs
can lift with precise control rarely seen in his size
dreams: Design a civic construct that sings to warn children from edges
Earn master straps without leaving the Iron Garden
secrets: Heard a retired war-construct remember an order to seize the Ossuary Palace; told only Arakel
Hides a forbidden face-stamp he carved as a child
